testcase.classname: As a user, I should be able to add items to chart with login and without login
testcase.name: User can add item to cart without login
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate home page...............................................passed When user does not login to the page........................................passed And user enter "Parfum" the name of the item they wish to buy in the search box.passed And user select 50 th item on the page......................................passed And user add two item from 1 seller and 2 seller to cart....................passed Then user display correct item on the Sepetim page..........................passed
